etri.sdn.controller

Class OFMFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • etri.sdn.controller.OFMFilter

  • public abstract class OFMFilter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is to filer OFMessage objects coming from the connections to switches with given condition. you can find the example usage of this class in OFMLinkDiscovery.initialize() method. This class is normally used as a second parameter to OFModule.registerFilter(org.openflow.protocol.interfaces.OFMessageType, OFMFilter).
    Author:
    bjlee

    • Method Detail

      • filter

        public abstract boolean filter(org.openflow.protocol.OFMessage m)
        OFMFilter method to override to define a message filter. If a filter is not given by a module, that module does not accept any messages.
        Parameters:
        m - message to accept
        Returns:
        returns true to accept the message, or returns false
